title: Blog
text:
Blog

title: Georges Lemuel Balogog
text:
I am a data science / optimization / data engineering professional with a hands-on approach: starting from operational constraints, structuring data, modeling, measuring impact with KPIs, and delivering usable artifacts (code, dashboards, docs).
My current focus: supply chain & optimization, ERP integration (Dynamics 365 SCM), and time series forecasting (energy / demand).

title: Georges Lemuel Balogog
text:
What I value

Clarity: readable and maintainable deliverables

Measurement: KPIs, validation, scenarios

Execution: deployment, automation, CI/CD

title: Georges Lemuel Balogog
text:
Data Science Â· Optimization Â· Data Engineering Â· Electrical Engineering
I build end-to-end analytical solutions: ingestion/ETL, predictive modeling, optimization (MILP/MIP), deployment (API/CI/CD), and decision-making dashboards.
Download CV

title: Georges Lemuel Balogog
text:
Featured Projects
A selection of my recent work.



Warehouse Optimization Solving MIP problems for storage optimization.
MIP Models for slotting, picking, and replenishment with KPI tracking and export.
Tech: Python Â· PuLP/Gurobi Â· NetworkX Â· Plotly



Energy Forecasting Predicting energy demand with Stats & ML models.
Demand forecasting using sliding window approach with TCN/RNN models, SARIMAX models, evaluated with MAE/RMSE/MAPE metrics and monitoring.
Tech: Python Â· TensorFlow Â· Pandas Â· ML lifecycle tools - R Â· Prophet Â· Statsmodels Â· Forecasting



Data Integration & BI ETL pipelines to Power BI dashboards.
Pipelines from various data sources (SQL Server, Excel, APIs) to Power BI dashboards with data quality checks and DAX measures.
Tech: Azure Databrick Â· SQL Â· Power BI Â· ETL/ELT Â· Data quality monitoring Â· DAX

Read more â†’

title: Georges Lemuel Balogog
text:
What I Do
My key areas of expertise.


Reinforcement Learning
Developing RL algorithms for decision-making.


Data Science & Machine Learning
Advanced analytics and predictive modeling.


Optimization & Operations Research
Solving complex optimization problems.


Data Engineering
Building robust and scalable data pipelines.


Heuristic & Metaheuristic Algorithms
Designing algorithms for complex problem-solving.
